title: Jarod DeAnda
description:
This was a fun show that went all over the place! Jarod DeAnda is basically the voice of Formula Drift. He's been an announcer for the series for nearly 20 years, and has an enthusiasm for the sport that comes through in his voice and his demeanor. We wanted to hear how he got his start but we also heard about: his philosophy behind work; the wardrobe rules of Enterprise car rental; his crazy truck crash while moving from AZ to CA; the new wave of golf; his favorite country to visit; when he and Matt first met; his couch; ADD diagnoses; his second car; and a lot, lot, lot more.

Grab a coffee and strap in for a fun one.

Recorded Dec 15, 2021

 

Find Valvoline at your local auto parts store.

 

Watch our new show, All Cars go to Heaven 3, here: https://youtu.be/AIncQODpC8s
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
